mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.description, p.image_path AS imagePath, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.username, u.user_image_path AS userImagePath FROM posts p JOIN auth_users u ON p.user_id = u.id;

SELECT p.id, p.user_id AS userId, p.title, p.description, p.image_path AS imagePath, p.created_at AS createdAt, p.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.username, u.user_image_path AS userImagePath FROM posts p JOIN auth_users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts( user_id, title, description, image_path, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{imagePath}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id};
